content.rendered:
#Revolutionizing professional services

CARIGAR

One-stop shop for all your service needs.

Get In Touch
Make an Enquiry

CARIGAR-Home Service App

Carigar is one-stop shop for all home-service, emergency or any type of service. Our platform connects users who are looking for any type of home related services to service providers like carpenter, interior designer, mason, yoga teacher, plumber, etc.

We have collected data of all carigars (service providers) from last two years and have uploaded all data onto our platform so that users can be directly connected with service providers and get their service done. On top of home services we are also help in up skilling carigars (service providers) with modern skills.

Carigar is the most convenient and hassle-free way to get your household work done. With well trained and background verified professionals we make sure all your plumbing, carpentry, electrical, appliance repair, house painting, vehicle care and other needs are taken care of. With Carigar App, you could make a booking, track status of your booking and rate the provider on the go. We have handcrafted the App to make your booking a delightful experience.

Our Home Service Professionals

Most Booked Services

Carpenter

Whether you require a verified carpenter for a small repair job or need a team of carpenters for new furniture making or to carry out home renovation projects

Book now
Electrician

Whether you require a skilled electrician for a small repair job or need a team of electricians for light fittings or to carry out home rewiring projects

Book now
Plumber

Whether you require a skilled plumber for a small repair job or need a team of plumbers for bath fittings or to install a new water pipeline connection

Book now
Appliance Installation & Repair

Whether you need your fridge repaired, your AC serviced, Carigar provides quality workmanship through skilled  experts

Book now
Painter

If you want to make your house look great, start with a fantastic painting in the way you want. Our network of carefully trained and professional painters have everything you need.

Book now
Interior Designer

A designer works with clients to create aesthetically pleasing rooms and spaces. If you want to give your home a new look by making indoor spaces functional, safe, and beautiful 

Book now

Services

Electrician
Home Salon
ACP & Steel Work
Interior Designer
Plumber
Mason
Pet Grooming
Gardener
Carpenter
Appliance Repair & Installation
Photographer
HPL Gates
Painter
Glasswork
Catering
Real Estate Broker

Let Us Do the Work for You, So That You Can Seize Your Day!

At Carigar, our mission is to free up precious time, and energy for our customers. We’ve have Carigars (our service providers) in your area, ready to help you get your time back. Book through Carigar and we’ll go to work on your household tasks, so that you’ve got the time to seize the day!

Are You A Service Provider

Bring in new orders and manage your own schedule

Click here

Premium Services

Previous
Next

How it Works

Choose a date and time that works for you, and tell us what you need.

 Carigar will find the perfect pro in minutes.

Your Carigar Pro gets the job done while you relax.

Carigar syncs your job status, messages, and receipt all in one place.

Best Offers

Our Valuable Customers

Awsome work!! Got my home interior redesigned with them. I didn't know that they willprovide such good service, they just amazed me by their work.
Umer
Srinagar
Had my Wardrobes made by their Carigar, Vishal. Did a great job. I really liked the work and professionality.
Ashiq Hussain
Srinagar

More About Us

Carigar is a home services provider that currently serves Srinagar City. It provides various services, including carpentry, electrician services, interior designing, and plumbing service, pet grooming, and lawn care.

Features on Carigar
Apart from the basic features, Carigar has the following features in its customer app, which makes it one of the best home service providers:
    • Timeline
      A great feature in the Carigar application is that you can add pictures of your bedroom, lawn, etc. while placing a service request. Professionals can also post  on timeline to showcase their work.
    • Help and Support
      In case the user has questions about the billing, rates, or anything, they can simply contact the customer executives via the given chat, email, and contact number. This is an excellent feature as users can get their issues resolved promptly.
    • Fedback and Rating
      Carigar shows the rating of the service providers before users book their preferred services. The app also gives its the option of rating and providing feedback upon the completion of the service.
    • Scheduling Services
      Carigar also provides the feature of booking the services in advance for a specific date. It also offers same-day delivery, and you can choose the time as per your needs.
Read More
